data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Sheng-Nan, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin (2014): The subgenus Choeras Mason, 1981 of genus Apanteles Foerster, 1862 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from China, with descriptions of eighteen new species. Zootaxa 3754 (5): 501-554, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.5.1
